summary.para: Carries information required to process the MCN_GETDAYSTATE notification code. All members of this structure are for input, except prgDayState, which the receiving application must set when processing MCN_GETDAYSTATE.
structure that contains information about this notification code.
structure that contains the starting date.
INT value specifying the total number of elements that must be in the array at prgDayState.
Address of an array of MONTHDAYSTATE values. The buffer at this address must be large enough to contain at least cDayState elements. The first element in the array corresponds to the date in stStart.
